Headline: #6 Jackson Park ExpressTemporary Southbound Reroute near Balbo/Wabash
ShortDescription: SB #6 Jackson Park Express buses are  rerouted via State, Harrison, Michigan, Balbo. then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Balbo/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Harrison, Michigan, Balbo. then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Balbo/Wabash.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Kostner. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Kostner. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
